Content:
Went riding for a few hours today and on my way home the engine light came on no flashing or anything. Disconnected the airbox sensor and reconnected. Nothing changed. Also disconnected the battery for about five minutes, nothing changed. Not too sure what I should try to do

Starts/idles/runs fine
